nodes.text: The Malaga Cluster was a location in the galaxy inhabited by the Ayelina and Ludmere. Around 232 BBY, Jedi Masters Avar Kriss and Nib Assek, along with Assek's Padawan Burryaga Agaburry, undertook a mission to the cluster to negotiate a trade agreement between the Ayelina and Ludmere, averting a diplomatic crisis.
